p: The lipid profile is a set of parameters among which LDL cholesterol, total cholesterol and triglycerides are those mainly involved in the risk factors of cardiovascular diseases ( Schaffer and Menche, 2004). The decrease in LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels in male rats as well as the maintenance of HDL cholesterol levels allow us to conclude that methanol extract from P.Â capense fruits at different treatment doses would not cause any risk of cardiovascular diseases occurrence.
